attributes.description:
Conquer the journey in a symphony of moments with the all-new, all-conquering, Haval H6. It offers a clean, contemporary design Influenced by bold architecture and mastered by modern engineering, the Haval H6 is a vehicle that embodies intelligent thinking. The Haval H6 features a powerful yet eco-friendly 2.0L Turbo charged engine producing 150kw and 320Nm at 6000 – r/min.
Highly spec features include:
-	Electronic Parking Brake
-	Auto Hold
-	Smart Start-stop
-	Tillt & Telescopic Steering
-	Driving & Terrain Modes (Standard, Eco, Sports, Snow, Sand, Offroad)
-	Torque on Demand AWD System
-	Dynamic Steering Modes (Sport, Comfort, Light)
-	Speed sensitive Electric Power Steering
-	Cruise Control
-	19 Inch Alloy Wheels
-	Auto Lift Tailgate
-	Panoramic Sunroof
-	Roof Rails
-	Rain-sensing wipers
-	Wireless charger
-	Leather Steering Wheel
-	Keyless entry & Push button start
-	Heated front seats
-	Paddle Shift
-	Front 12V power outlet
-	Dashcam Power outlet
-	10.25-inch Colour Combination Instrument
-	Leather seats
-	Driver seat Electric adjust: 6 directions
-	60:40 split folding rear seats
-	6 Airbags: Dual + Side + Curtain
-	Child Safety lock & Isofix
-	Electronic Stability System (ESC) + Traction Control (TCS)
-	Anti-Roll System (RMI) + Secondary Collision Mitigation (SCM)
-	Cornering Brake Control & Brake Assist
-	Hill Decent & Uphill Assist
-	Tyre pressure monitoring system (TPMS)
-	Front Parking Sensors
-	Rear Parking Sensors
-	360 Degree panoramic Camera
-	Adaptive Cruise, Traffic Jam assist and Intelligent Turning Assist
-	Pre-collision warning, Automatic emergency braking
-	Lane Departure Alert, Lane Keeping Assist and Lane Centre Keeping
-	Traffic sign recognition
-	Blind spot detection with Rear Cross Traffic Alert and Lane change assist
-	Head-Up Display
-	Driver Fatigue Alert
-	12.3-inch multimedia touch display
-	Bluetooth Connectivity
-	Speed Sensitive Volume Control
-	Carplay & Android Auto
-	LED headlights & Taillamps
-	Automatic headlights + Follow Me Home
-	Front Fog LED
-	Daytime running lamps
-	Dual Zone Auto Aircon with Rear aircon duct
-	Standard with 5yr/100 000Km Warranty and 5yr/60 000Km Service Plan
attributes.title: 2022 Haval H6 2.0T Super Luxury 4X4 Auto

attributes.description:
Conquer the journey in the all-new, all-conquering, Haval Jolion. It offers a clean, contemporary design Influenced by bold architecture and mastered by modern engineering, the Jolion is a vehicle that embodies intelligent thinking. The Jolion features a powerful yet eco-friendly 1.5 Turbo engine producing 105kw @ 210Nm and a measured 7,5L/100km giving you the best of both worlds.
Highly spec features include:
-	Speed sensitive Electric Power Steering
-	Adjustable steering
-	Electronic Parking Brake
-	Cruise Control

-	60:40 split folding rear seats
-	Dual and front Side airbags
-	Curtain Airbags
-	Child lock
-	ABS + EBD (Electronic Brakeforce Distribution) + BA (Brake Assist)
-	Electronic Stability System (ESC) + Traction Control (TCS)

-	Hill Assist

-	Standard with 5yr/100 000Km Warranty and 5yr/60 000Km Service Plan

attributes.description:
Conquer the journey in the all-new, all-conquering GWM P-Series Passenger Double Cab. The GWM P-Series Passenger Double Cab is a brand-new addition to the range of strong, reliable and "workaholic" GWM bakkies that are built for true adaptability. It features a responsive ZF 8AT speed gearbox, multi-link rear suspension and is powered by a 2.0 litre diesel engine with a mighty 120kW and 400n.m of torque.
Highly spec features include:
- 6 airbags, up/downhill assist control and vehicle stability control
- 9" touchscreen that comes standard with voice control, Carplay and wireless charging
- Smart keyless entry and push start button
- LED taillight and daytime running headlamps
- TOD (Torque on Demand) and Rear Diff lock
- Steering Sensitivity Adjustable
- Electronic Parking Brake
-Leather Seats
-Rear view camera + Guidlines
- Dynamic Steering Torque
- Bluetooth
- Abs+Electronic Brake Distribution
- Traction control+ Roll over mitigation + Brake Assist System
- Hill Assist and Descent Control
- Tyre Pressure Monitor System
- 5year/100 000Km manufacturer’s warranty and service plan
attributes.title: 2022 GWM P-Series PV 2.0 TD LS 4x4 Auto Double-Cab

It features a responsive ZF 8AT speed gearbox, multi-link rear suspension and is powered by a 2.0 litre diesel engine with a mighty 120kW and 400n.m of torque.

attributes.title: 2022 GWM P-Series PV 2.0 TD LS Auto Double-Cab

attributes.description:
Introducing the all-new, all-conquering GWM P-Series Commercial Double Cab. The P-Series Commercial Double Cab is a brand-new addition to the range of robust, reliable and "workaholic" GWM bakkies that are built for true versatility. This legendary bakkie is powerful, not just instinctively, but practically. To elevate your travels to even greater heights, the Commercial Double Cab features an option of a responsive 8AT and 6MT gearbox, multi-link rear suspension and is powered by a 2.0 litre diesel engine with a mighty 120kW and 400n.m of torque.
Highly spec features include:
-	17" Alloy Rim
-	Sidestep
- 	Sun Roof
-	Centre Soft Covering of Front & Rear Door Panel
- 	Leather
-	Steering Wheel Controls
-	3.5 Inch Colour Instrument Cluster
-	12V Power Outlet
-	Front Usb Port (2)
-	Cruise Control
-	Vehicle Stability Control (Esc/Esp)
-	Hydraulic Brake Assist System (Hba)
-	Traction Control System (Tcs)
-	Hill-Start Assist Control
-	Hill Decent Control
-	Tpms (Tyre Pressure Monitor System)
- 	Reverse Camera
-	Rear Parking Sensors
-	Dual Front Airbags
- 	Side Airbags and Side Curtain Airbags
-	ISOFIX
-	Front & Rear Electric Windows
-	Bluetooth hands-free calling
- 	Carplay and Android Auto
-	Daytime Running Lights
-	5year/100 000Km manufacturer’s warranty and service plan
